title: 'Winning Time: The Rise of the Lakers Dynasty' Series Premiere Recap
description:
The Ringer's Bill Simmons and Joe House discuss the premiere episode of HBO's 'Winning Time: The Rise of the Lakers Dynasty'.

Hosts: Bill Simmons and Joe House
Producer: Kyle Crichton
